To use A2PNS app, the notification listener permission is required. Please tap the button below and grant permission in next screen, then come back to the app to continue.

Why? The app needs notification listener permission in order to capture and redirect notifications generated by other apps and services to specific user devices.

Before we utilize A2PNS app to redirect notifications, we need to pair our devices (or we don\'t know where to send, right?).\n\nJust download a companion app, tap the button below, and follow the instructions!
We definitely don\'t want to collect all app notifications. That would be NUMEROUS!\n\nInstead, tap the button below to select apps to be watched for notifications!
The first-run setup is done!\n\nNext: Just tap Finish and you are good to go!
